meanings.definition: To replant trees in (a deforested area)
meanings.sent1: The environmental group reforests the barren land with new trees.
meanings.sent2: After the wildfire, the community came together to reforest the burnt area.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel decided to reforest the park with acorns instead of trees.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness reforests the desolate hearts of those around her.
meanings.sent5: The magical wand waved by the fairy reforests the enchanted forest in seconds.
